name: Ember Ritual
description:
Your loved one has been captured by a cloud spirit. To save her, you must perform a ritual by activating the 7 runes scattered across the area.

Be careful however, because this ritual also spawned evil flying ghosts! They're trying to steal your flame, which is the last essence of fire in this barren wasteland.

____

Our entry for the Extra Credits Game Jam #4.

WEB VERSION : https://narryn.itch.io/emberritualwebtest
